body:
### Problem

Currently, Neovim supports `insertTextFormat = 2` (snippet) in LSP completion items, but does not handle snippet expansion in code actions or WorkspaceEdit edits, even if the server explicitly sets `insertTextFormat = 2`.
Here is the example:
```dart
{                                                                                                                                                                        
  command = {                                                                                                                                                            
    arguments = { {                                                                                                                                                      
        action = "dart.assist.flutter.wrap.generic"                                                                                                                      
      } },                                                                                                                                                               
    command = "dart.logAction",                                                                                                                                          
    title = "Log Action"                                                                                                                                                 
  },                                                                                                                                                                     
  diagnostics = {},                                                                                                                                                      
  edit = {                                                                                                                                                               
    documentChanges = { {                                                                                                                                                
        edits = { {                                                                                                                                                      
            insertTextFormat = 2,                                                                                                                                        
            newText = "${1:widget}(${2:child}: Text(context.l10n.note))",                                                                                        
            range = {                                                                                                                                                    
              ["end"] = {                                                                                                                                                
                character = 63,                                                                                                                                          
                line = 123                                                                                                                                               
              },                                                                                                                                                         
              start = {                                                                                                                                                  
                character = 32,                                                                                                                                          
                line = 123                                                                                                                                               
              }                                                                                                                                                          
            }                                                                                                                                                            
          } },                                                                                                                                                           
        textDocument = {                                                                                                                                                 
          uri = "file:///Users/ts/Documents/github/widget.dart",                                               
          version = 0                                                                                                                                                    
        }                                                                                                                                                                
      } }                                                                                                                                                                
  },                                                                                                                                                                     
  kind = "refactor.flutter.wrap.generic",                                                                                                                                
  title = "Wrap with widget..."                                                                                                                                          
} 
```
Capabilities needs to be set to enable it: `capabilities.experimental = { snippetTextEdit = true }`

Related issue: https://github.com/nvim-flutter/flutter-tools.nvim/issues/426

### Expected behavior

When a TextEdit or WorkspaceEdit has `insertTextFormat = 2`, Neovim could:
- Recognize it as a snippet
- Parse the newText with placeholders (${1}, $0, etc.)
- Optionally delegate expansion to the configured snippet engine (e.g. LuaSnip, vsnip)

Is there a plan to support such functionality in Neovim?

comment_data.body:
> Is there a plan to support such functionality in Neovim?

Yes: https://github.com/neovim/neovim/pull/30287

milestone.description: Low priority items. We plan to work on this but don't have a target date.
milestone.title: backlog

title: Support snippet expansion (insertTextFormat = 2) in LSP code actions / WorkspaceEdit

type.description: A request, idea, or new functionality
type.name: Enhancement
